C19.flavor: Rakshasa trade in secrets, amassing wealth from their careful revelation.
C19.name: Secret Plans
C19.text:
Face-down creatures you control get +0/+1.
Whenever a permanent you control is turned face up, draw a card.

C19.flavor: "The veil between the living and the dead is so very thin that the whispers of the ancients can finally be heard." —Amalric of Midvast Hall
C19.name: Secrets of the Dead
C19.text: Whenever you cast a spell from your graveyard, draw a card.

C19.flavor:
"Her voice is the wilderness, savage and pure."
—Kamahl, druid acolyte
C19.name: Seedborn Muse
C19.text: Untap all permanents you control during each other player's untap step.

C19.flavor: "Let the example of the fallen inspire us all to greater courage."
C19.name: Selesnya Eulogist
C19.text: {2}{G}: Exile target creature card from a graveyard, then populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)

C19.name: Sevinne's Reclamation
C19.text:
Return target permanent card with converted mana cost 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. If this spell was cast from a graveyard, you may copy this spell and may choose a new target for the copy.
Flashback {4}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

C19.flavor: "The best moments are worth reliving."
C19.name: Sevinne, the Chronoclasm
C19.text:
Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Sevinne, the Chronoclasm.
Whenever you cast your first instant or sorcery spell from your graveyard each turn, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

C19.flavor: First, whispers of ancient days. Then, visions of things to come.
C19.name: Shamanic Revelation
C19.text:
Draw a card for each creature you control.
Ferocious — You gain 4 life for each creature you control with power 4 or greater.

C19.flavor: The gods known to the merfolk as Ula, Emeria, and Cosi were nothing more than false memories of a monstrous trinity: the Eldrazi titans Ulamog, Emrakul, and Kozilek.
C19.name: Shrine of the Forsaken Gods
C19.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add {C}{C}. Spend this mana only to cast colorless spells. Activate this ability only if you control seven or more lands.

C19.name: Silumgar Assassin
C19.text:
Creatures with power greater than Silumgar Assassin's power can't block it.
Megamorph {2}{B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
When Silumgar Assassin is turned face up, destroy target creature with power 3 or less an opponent controls.

C19.name: Simic Growth Chamber
C19.text:
Simic Growth Chamber enters the battlefield tapped.
When Simic Growth Chamber enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand.
{T}: Add {G}{U}.

C19.flavor:
"Mystery is beauty. Within the unknown we plumb revelation."
—Vannifar
C19.name: Simic Guildgate
C19.text:
Simic Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G} or {U}.

C19.name: Skinthinner
C19.text:
Morph {3}{B}{B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Skinthinner is turned face up, destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

C19.flavor: Lost to time is the artificer's art of trapping light from a distant star in a ring of purest gold.
C19.name: Sol Ring
C19.text: {T}: Add {C}{C}.

C19.flavor: "Mat'Selesnya sings out, and life flourishes in answer."
C19.name: Song of the Worldsoul
C19.text: Whenever you cast a spell, populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)

C19.flavor:
"When you hear thunder on a cloudless day, take cover and brace for the coming of the storm herd."
—Skotov, Tin Street basket vendor
C19.name: Storm Herd
C19.text: Create X 1/1 white Pegasus creature tokens with flying, where X is your life total.

C19.name: Stratus Dancer
C19.text:
Flying
Megamorph {1}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
When Stratus Dancer is turned face up, counter target instant or sorcery spell.

C19.flavor: Its tines cannot be rung by mere physical force. Only magic of great power can start its eldritch resonance.
C19.name: Strionic Resonator
C19.text: {2}, {T}: Copy target triggered ability you control. You may choose new targets for the copy. (A triggered ability uses the words "when," "whenever," or "at.")

C19.flavor: "Bow before the might of—wait, what?"
C19.name: Sudden Substitution
C19.text:
Split second (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.)
Exchange control of target noncreature spell and target creature. Then the spell's controller may choose new targets for it.

C19.flavor: "Strike," the fumes hiss. "Raise an empire with your ambition."
C19.name: Sultai Charm
C19.text:
Choose one —
• Destroy target monocolored creature.
• Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
• Draw two cards, then discard a card.

C19.flavor: A blazing sun that never sets.
C19.name: Sun Titan
C19.text:
Vigilance
Whenever Sun Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, you may return target permanent card with converted mana cost 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

C19.flavor: On Otaria, peace and harmony are rare. Places that provide both are cherished.
C19.name: Sungrass Prairie

C19.flavor: On the continent of Tazeem, rushing waters plunge through narrow canyons into mist-cloaked lakes.
C19.name: Sunken Hollow
C19.text:
({T}: Add {U} or {B}.)
Sunken Hollow enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or more basic lands.

C19.name: Tahngarth, First Mate
C19.text:
Tahngarth, First Mate can't be blocked by more than one creature.
Whenever an opponent attacks with one or more creatures, if Tahngarth is tapped, you may have that opponent gain control of Tahngarth until end of combat. If you do, choose a player or planeswalker that opponent is attacking. Tahngarth is attacking that player or planeswalker.

C19.flavor: "The seas are vast, but the skies are even more so. Why be content with one kingdom when I can rule them both?"
C19.name: Talrand, Sky Summoner
C19.text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, create a 2/2 blue Drake creature token with flying.

C19.flavor: Hellions measure their meals in mountains.
C19.name: Tectonic Hellion
C19.text:
Haste
Whenever Tectonic Hellion attacks, each player who controls the most lands sacrifices two lands.

C19.flavor:
"When gods become apathetic, the people will worship anyone who answers their pleas."
—Kiora
C19.name: Temple of the False God
C19.text: {T}: Add {C}{C}. Activate this ability only if you control five or more lands.

C19.name: Tempt with Discovery
C19.text: Tempting offer — Search your library for a land card and put it onto the battlefield. Each opponent may search their library for a land card and put it onto the battlefield. For each opponent who searches a library this way, search your library for a land card and put it onto the battlefield. Then each player who searched a library this way shuffles it.

C19.name: Terramorphic Expanse
C19.text: {T}, Sacrifice Terramorphic Expanse: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

C19.name: Tezzeret's Gambit
C19.text:
({U/P} can be paid with either {U} or 2 life.)
Draw two cards, then proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

C19.name: Thalia's Geistcaller
C19.text:
Lifelink
Whenever you cast a spell from your graveyard, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.
Sacrifice a Spirit: Thalia's Geistcaller gains indestructible until end of turn.

C19.name: Thelonite Hermit
C19.text:
Saproling creatures get +1/+1.
Morph {3}{G}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Thelonite Hermit is turned face up, create four 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens.

C19.flavor: Amid rumors of war, the third act of *The Absolution of the Guildpact* was quickly rewritten as a tragedy.
C19.name: Thespian's Stage
C19.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{2}, {T}: Thespian's Stage becomes a copy of target land, except it has this ability.

C19.name: Thieving Amalgam
C19.text:
At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, you manifest the top card of that player's library. (Put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)
Whenever a creature you control but don't own dies, its owner loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

C19.flavor: "Either I know just the spell I need, or I'm about to."
C19.name: Think Twice
C19.text:
Draw a card.
Flashback {2}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

C19.name: Thornwood Falls
C19.text:
Thornwood Falls enters the battlefield tapped.
When Thornwood Falls enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {G} or {U}.

C19.name: Thought Sponge
C19.text:
Flash
Thought Sponge enters the battlefield with a number of +1/+1 counters on it equal to the greatest number of cards an opponent has drawn this turn.
When Thought Sponge dies, draw cards equal to its power.

C19.name: Thousand Winds
C19.text:
Flying
Morph {5}{U}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Thousand Winds is turned face up, return all other tapped creatures to their owners' hands.

C19.flavor: Urza's metathran children were conceived, birthed, and nurtured by an integrated system of machines.
C19.name: Thran Dynamo
C19.text: {T}: Add {C}{C}{C}.

C19.name: Trail of Mystery
C19.text:
Whenever a face-down creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
Whenever a permanent you control is turned face up, if it's a creature, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

C19.flavor: There are no soloists in the chorus of Selesnya.
C19.name: Trostani, Selesnya's Voice
C19.text:
Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you gain life equal to that creature's toughness.
{1}{G}{W}, {T}: Populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)

C19.flavor: As the Simic released more of their krasis experiments, they required new habitats, always at the expense of the locals.
C19.name: Urban Evolution
C19.text: Draw three cards. You may play an additional land this turn.

C19.name: Vesuvan Shapeshifter
C19.text:
As Vesuvan Shapeshifter enters the battlefield or is turned face up, you may choose another creature on the battlefield. If you do, until Vesuvan Shapeshifter is turned face down, it becomes a copy of that creature, except it has "At the beginning of your upkeep, you may turn this creature face down."
Morph {1}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

C19.flavor: His words echo every roar, screech, and howl of the wilds.
C19.name: Voice of Many
C19.text: When Voice of Many enters the battlefield, draw a card for each opponent who controls fewer creatures than you.

C19.name: Volrath, the Shapestealer
C19.text:
At the beginning of combat on your turn, put a -1/-1 counter on up to one target creature.
{1}: Until your next turn, Volrath, the Shapestealer becomes a copy of target creature with a counter on it, except it's 7/5 and it has this ability.

C19.name: Vraska the Unseen
C19.text:
+1: Until your next turn, whenever a creature deals combat damage to Vraska the Unseen, destroy that creature.
−3: Destroy target nonland permanent.
−7: Create three 1/1 black Assassin creature tokens with "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player loses the game."

C19.name: Wall of Stolen Identity
C19.text: You may have Wall of Stolen Identity enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield, except it's a wall in addition to its other types and it has defender. When you do, tap the copied creature and it doesn't untap during its controller's untap step for as long as you control Wall of Stolen Identity.

C19.name: Willbender
C19.text:
Morph {1}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Willbender is turned face up, change the target of target spell or ability with a single target.

C19.flavor: Waterways carve their routes through the land to reflect the paths the aether streams cut through the clouds.
C19.name: Woodland Stream
C19.text:
Woodland Stream enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G} or {U}.

C19.name: Yavimaya Coast
C19.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add {G} or {U}. Yavimaya Coast deals 1 damage to you.

C19.flavor: The sky takes flight and the earth trembles.
C19.name: Zetalpa, Primal Dawn
C19.text: Flying, double strike, vigilance, trample, indestructible

ELD.flavor: It started as a mere drop of water. The Magic Mirror crystallized it into much more.
ELD.name: Arcane Signet
ELD.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

ELD.name: Chulane, Teller of Tales
ELD.text:
Vigilance
Whenever you cast a creature spell, draw a card, then you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.
{3}, {T}: Return target creature you control to its owner's hand.
